h1: Calories in Dunkin Donuts Hash Browns

quick_answer.text: One serving of Dunkin' hash browns provides 150 kcal, 16 g carbs, and 9 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Dunkin Donuts hash brown?
What are the carbs in hash browns from Dunkin Donuts?
faqs.a: 16 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 0 g sugars per serving.

faqs.q: Are Dunkin hash browns high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 310 mg sodium per servingâ€”13% of daily value.

faqs.q: How much fat in Dunkin Donuts hash browns?

faqs.q: Can I get lower calorie hash browns at Dunkin?
faqs.a: No direct option, but skip extras like ketchup to keep at 150 kcal; consider alternatives like fruit.
